item.title: #en @ 1437962707727261700
item.description: See the results section here? That's generated by the software they're using. There's no way to just extract the raw data and publish it directly. (Trust me, I tried - I ran the city's open data program for 2 years and wanted to publish this as machine readable data.) #bospoli https://t.co/1FvCuYc6Ce
